column4: hi! i'm running some "hello world"-like python script and python process consume 100% of both my CPU... where can i start to fix this please ?
it runs ok for me too, but even with the console shutted down, the python's process keep consuming 100%... :(
thats probably due to another process?
i've stopped both python process and everything come back to normal (average 20%CPU)
it might be my attempt to install eclipse and pydev plugin that started a undesirable process maybe...
i just thought it was running some loop etc or doing some crazy maths
nope i'm learning programming with a very basic tutorial... just this
would you advice me vi or gedit ? :)
